summary.p: Transcriptions of Tamil and Sanskrit inscriptions by Ariel. Contains also maps, drawings, translations, syllabaries. Various papers of various format bound, seemingly in disorder, in one volume.

The volume contains:
f1: map/plan.
f2-f3: missing folios, if ever existed.
f4-f9: transcription of inscriptions in Tamil script.
f10: transcription of an inscription in Tamil script.
f11-f13: description in French of the temple at Tiruvakkarai.
f14-f15: temple map (Tiruvakkarai?).
f16-f18: transcription of inscriptions (Grantha in the left column; Tamil script in the right column).
f19-f33: copy of appendix of Ellis’ Mirasi Rights (see f33v).
f34-f36: wall drawings with inscriptions transcribed in Tamil at their location on the wall.

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

provenance.p: Autograph work by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequested by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).
